document.full_text: j. d. drew singled home carl crawford from with two outs in the 14th inning for a 9-8 win over the oakland athletics after jonathan papelbon blew a four-run lead.
document.title: roundup: papelbon loses lead in 9th, but red sox rally in the 14th
lines_and_colors: j. d. drew singled home carl crawford from with two outs in the 14th inning for a 9-8 win over the oakland athletics after jonathan papelbon blew a four-run lead.
